name: Two Sides to a Seeker
description:
This is a submission for the CCC Game Jam

Please rate the game here: https://itch.io/jam/ccc-jam/rate/645592

You play as a salamander as you must help out a group of villagers by collecting fruit, all while being taunted by your inner voices. 

Explore the glowing forest for these exotic fruits, search for tunnels to take you back to the village

What ending will you choose?

-Both purple plants are the only models reused from a past project

-All music is custom but from past projects
